RECIPE NAME

INGREDIENTS

  • wheat flour
  • bicarbonate of soda
  • eggs
  • brown sugar
  • can of beans
  • chicken scraps
  • cat food
  • sriracha sauce
  • ketchup
  • onions

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Watch how to make this recipe.
  2. In a large bowl, whisk together buttermilk, eggs, baking powder, sugar, salt and butter.
  3. In another large bowl mix together all-purpose flour and buckwheat flour.
  4. Mix until there are no lumps and the batter is smooth and velvety.
  5. In a large cast iron skillet or flat grill pan over medium-high heat, melt a tablespoon of butter. Ladle pancake batter onto skillet to desired size. Using the ladle, form pancake into circular shape. Cook on each side for 2 to 3 minutes or until golden brown. Set pancakes aside and keep warm. Repeat with remaining ingredients.

COST

$6.00
